activities: National Hotline Services, Inc. (NHS) provides compliance and ethics hotlines and online reporting services to companies located throughout the world.  All information received is directly relayed to our clients.  NHS does not act as a repository of this information, and all specific hotline and online reporting data is purged from our systems sixty (60) days after receipt.  NHS never shares this data with anyone other than the client who established the hotline and/or online reporting system.  NHS also adheres to all applicable privacy requirements and undergoes quarterly security audits to ensure the integrity of our electronic systems.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
